author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content:
This is how Teku and Besu implemented it ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ 
It also follows the order we have on the Engine API (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/prague.md#executionpayloadv4).

So in the Block Header,  `deposits_root` comes first, `exits_root` second. And for Block Body, `deposits` first, `exits` second.
